title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Developing AI Solutions: What Every Developer Should Know (TNC207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开发AI解决方案：每个开发者都应该知道的事项 (TNC207)
abstract: What skills will set you apart as a generative AI developer? Drawing from the AWS Certification team's 2025 market research and insights from AWS service teams, discover the competencies employers are actively seeking. Learn how AWS Certifications can accelerate your journey in building AI-powered solutions, while helping organizations identify and validate the talent they need for successful generative AI adoption.
abstract_cn: 作为生成式AI开发者，哪些技能能让你脱颖而出？基于AWS认证团队2025年市场研究以及AWS服务团队的洞察，了解雇主正在积极寻求的能力。学习AWS认证如何加速你在构建AI驱动解决方案方面的发展历程，同时帮助组织识别和验证成功采用生成式AI所需的人才。
